story:
Once upon a time, in a beautiful village in Iraq, there lived a kind-hearted young boy named Ali. Ali was known throughout the village for his courage, compassion, and love for helping others.

One sunny afternoon, as Ali was walking through the village, he heard a soft whimpering coming from a nearby bush. Curious, Ali approached the bush and discovered a small injured bird. Without hesitation, Ali gently picked up the bird and carefully carried it home.

Ali spent his evenings caring for the bird, feeding it and nursing it back to health. The bird, whom Ali named Zara, soon became his loyal companion and followed him wherever he went.

One evening, as the sun was setting, Ali and Zara ventured out into the fields to watch the stars appear in the night sky. Ali pointed out each constellation to Zara, telling her stories of bravery and kindness.

As the night grew darker, Ali and Zara settled down under a big tree, watching the twinkling stars above. Ali whispered to Zara, "Even in the darkest of nights, there is always light to guide us. Just like the stars in the sky, our love and kindness will always shine bright."

With Zara nestled next to him, Ali closed his eyes and drifted off to sleep, feeling grateful for the love and friendship he shared with his little bird.

And so, under the starlit sky, Ali and Zara continued to spread love and kindness across the village, inspiring others to do the same.

As you close your eyes and drift off to sleep, remember the tale of Ali and Zara, and may their story fill your dreams with hope and warmth. Goodnight, my dear child. Sleep tight, and may your dreams be as bright as the stars above.
